LanguageData.Raiding_Required.label: required
LanguageData.Raiding_Required.description: We don't work like common laborers, we take from the weak as the strong should. Failing to do so is a tremendous shame.

LanguageData.Raiding_Respected.label: respected
LanguageData.Raiding_Respected.description: We don't work like common laborers, we take from the weak as the strong should. Failing to do so is a mark of shame.
